title: Episode 7: Lonely Hearts
description: Jesse always wanted to fall in love. So when the perfect woman started writing him letters, it seemed too good to be true. Because it was. This week, a story about a con — with a twist. When the con was exposed, its victims defended the con artists. They still wanted to believe the lie.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
